issues.description: Field 'animals' in Farm is declared as Queue<Animal> in the solution but the problem statementâ€™s UML and text specify a List<Animal> (implemented via ArrayList) for the aggregation.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the type of the 'animals' field in Farm to List<Animal> and initialize it as a new ArrayList<>() in the no-argument constructor.

issues.description: The getter 'getAnimals()' in Farm returns Queue<Animal> but the problem text requires a getter returning List<Animal> to match the specified ArrayList usage.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the return type of getAnimals() to List<Animal>.

issues.description: The setter 'setAnimals(...)' in Farm accepts Queue<Animal> but the specification expects a setter taking List<Animal> to align with the ArrayList-based design.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the parameter type of setAnimals(...) to List<Animal>.
